import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" function SignUp() { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm() console.log(errors) const navigate = useNavigate(); function onSubmit(data) { console.log("Submit button is clicked", data) navigate('/home') } return ( <>

{errors?.name?.message}


{errors?.phoneNumber?.message}


{errors?.email?.message}


{errors?.password?.message}


{errors?.cpassword?.message}

Already Registered? sign in

); } export default SignUp;
